responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "4ED160FA455CC3491F98018B27DF5650", "This particular evening, as I rested beside the rhythmic burble of an unnamed creek, I caught movement beyond the tawny vegetation. Careful not to make any sudden movements that might give away my presence, I shifted my gaze and saw a fully-grown stag emerging from the brush on the opposite bank, a short distance downriver. As it lowered its head to drink from the creek, I resisted the urge to look directly at it, fearing it might flee. Instead, I focused on its reflection, stretched and wobbling on the wind-rippled surface of the water. As the breeze subsided, the ripples stilled, and the woodland creature\'s reflection came into sharp focus.")
name: DD_Ambient_TotH3_A_34
